text: James Robert Glass (born 1 August 1973) is an English retired football player. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:English association football goalkeepers Category:Brentford F.C. players Category:Burnley F.C. players Category:Crystal Palace F.C. players Category:AFC Bournemouth players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Surrey
